definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) Pacific loon (Gavia pacifica)
(bird species of China) common loon (Gavia immer)
(bird species of China) red-throated loon (Gavia stellata)
(bird species of China) yellow-billed loon (Gavia adamsii)
(bird species of China) black-throated loon (Gavia arctica)

sentences.english: Lake Greenery heavy, rich in moose, black bear, flying squirrels, and Diver.
sentences.chinese: 湖畔綠茵重重，盛產駝鹿，黑熊，飛鼠和潛鳥。

sentences.english: ‘Common Loon’” he reads. “It looks like a duck.”
sentences.chinese: 普通潛鳥”他讀着，“看上去像鴨子。”
